# __Scraping from BasketballRef__
In order to scrape from BasketballReference.com, we are going to need to utilize
the "rvest" and "dplyr" packages within R. 

# __Load Packages__
Let's load the required packages.
```{r}
library(rvest)
library(dplyr)
```
